label: UX Designer
narrative: Somebody who leans more on creativity than technical skill has a strong sense for aesthetics and user experience. They often will work paired up with development oriented teams to execute on a vision, with the ability to express the desired end state to reach a creative design vision.

challenges: working within design constraints of legacy systems
communicating precision of font, colors, and other design elements to technical team
balancing creative objectives with technical constraints
brand guidelines that prevent full creative control
opinion-based decision making with ambiguity over authority
do: include visual representations to complement text such as logos and infographics
